Pemghapusan Pejabat Eselon IV dan III Awal 2020, Ini Tanggapan Bupati Subang
07 Nov 2019, 14:16 by Ruslan Efendi


Pemghapusan Pejabat Eselon IV dan III Awal 2020, Ini Tanggapan Bupati Subang

KBRN, Subang : Rencana pemerintah pusat yang akan menghapus jabatan eselon IV dan III dikalangan birokrasi, membuat Bupati Subang Ruhimat pusing.
Maka dari itu Ruhimat, dalam waktu dekat ini segera melakukan koordinasi dengan Menteri Dalam Negeri, Kemenpan RB, dan BKN.
"Saya masih bingung harus seperti apa yang harus saya lakukan," ujar Ruhimat kepada wartawan di Subang, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Sementara itu diungkapkan Ruhimat, ada ratusan bahkan ribuan jabatan eselon IV dan III, yang harus kehilangan jabatan Kasi dan Kabid serta Sekretaris.
"Dengan diberlakukannya ketentuan itu, maka ada berapa banyak ASN yang memiliki jabatan Kasi, Kabid dan Sekretaris yang kehilangan jabatannya," terangnya.
Ruhimat menyebutkan, di sisi lain dirinya wajib melaksanakan ketentuan itu, tetapi di sisi lain lagi Pemkab Subang belum mengetahui juklak dan juknis penghapusan jabatan eselon IV dan III tersebut, yang akan diberlakukan di awal tahun 2020 nanti.

Elimination of Echelon IV and III Officials Beginning in 2020, This Is the Subang Regent's Response
Nov 7 2019, 14:16 by Ruslan Efendi


Elimination of Echelon IV and III Officials Beginning in 2020, This Is the Subang Regent's Response

KBRN, Subang: The plan of the central government to abolish echelon IV and III positions among the bureaucracy, making the Subang Regent Ruhimat dizzy.
Therefore Ruhimat, in the near future will immediately coordinate with the Minister of the Interior, Kemenpan RB, and BKN.
"I'm still confused about what I should do," Ruhimat told reporters in Subang, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Meanwhile Ruhimat revealed, there were hundreds or even thousands of echelon IV and III positions, which had to lose the Kasi and Kabid positions as well as the Secretary.
"With the enactment of these provisions, then how many ASNs have the Kasi, Kabid and Secretary positions who have lost their positions," he explained.
Ruhimat said, on the other hand he was obliged to implement the provisions, but on the other side the Subang Regency Government did not yet know the operational guidelines and technical guidelines for the removal of echelon IV and III positions, which will be put into effect in early 2020.
